function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in communal and private spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement separate air cycles, pressure differentials, and extraction to establish positive flow","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, pressure differential systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in communal and private spaces","Owner":"Building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of early detection systems for SARS-CoV-2 in sewer networks","Impact":"Delayed or undetected spread of the virus in communities","Mitigation":"Retrofitting stratified sewer collection systems and incorporating fifth-order sampling points in sewer design","Technologies":"Urological wastewater testing, automated or manual in-line sampling","People":"Community residents, urban planners, wastewater management professionals","Owner":"Urban planners, developers, municipal authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in large enclosed spaces such as open-plan offices and classrooms","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the enclosed spaces","Mitigation":"Reconsidering open-plan design, implementing air filtration systems, and improving ventilation","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilation systems","People":"Office workers, students, shoppers","Owner":"Company management, school authorities, property developers"}]}
